short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automated trading on Fidelity. Execute same trade on all your accounts. Use at own risk. Not financial advice. See full disclaimer.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Botelity is a powerful Chrome extension designed for Fidelity investment account holders who want to streamline their trading process across multiple accounts. This innovative tool allows you to execute the same trade simultaneously on all your Fidelity accounts with just a few clicks, saving you valuable time and ensuring consistency in your investment strategy. Whether you're managing personal accounts, family trusts, or business portfolios, Botelity simplifies the process of maintaining balanced investments across your entire Fidelity ecosystem. The extension integrates seamlessly with Fidelity's trading platform, providing an intuitive interface for inputting trade details such as ticker symbol, quantity, and buy/sell action. While Botelity offers convenience and efficiency, it's important to note that it facilitates automated trading, which carries inherent risks. Users should exercise caution, thoroughly understand their investment strategy, and be aware of the potential for rapid execution of trades across all linked accounts. Botelity is not a financial advisor and does not provide investment advice; it's a tool for executing your own informed decisions more efficiently. We strongly encourage users to review our full disclaimer and terms of use before installing and using this extension. Botelity is the perfect solution for savvy investors looking to optimize their trading workflow while maintaining full control over their investment decisions.
